title: Neural Structured Learning - Part 3: Training with synthesized graphs
excerpt: Welcome to episode 3 of our short series on Neural Structured Learning! In this episode, Software Engineer Arjun Gopalan discusses how graphs can be constructed from raw input data and then be used to train neural networks.
